projects.title: WEATHER APP
projects.description: I developed a dynamic and responsive weather application using React, showcasing my proficiency in modern web development technologies. The application provides real-time weather information and forecasts based on user-selected locations.

projects.title: PASSWORD GENERATOR
projects.description: Designed and implemented a robust Password Generator web application using React, showcasing proficiency in front-end development and state management. The application allows users to create secure and customizable passwords for various online accounts.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: Developed a dynamic and responsive personal portfolio website using React, showcasing a combination of technical proficiency and creative design. This project serves as a testament to my expertise in front-end development and user interface design. Leveraging React's component-based architecture, the website offers a seamless and engaging user experience.

projects.title: TEXT-TRANSFORM APP
projects.description: As a passionate and innovative developer, I conceptualized and implemented a dynamic Text Transform project using React, showcasing my proficiency in front-end web development. This project serves as a testament to my skills in crafting user-friendly interfaces and leveraging the power of React components.
